sent.orig: Moral behavior, determined by moral feelings, strenghtens moral cognition and moral feeling.
sent.trans: 道德情感以道德认识为基础而又强化道德认识，道德情感决定道德行为，道德行为也强化道德认识和道德情感。

sent.orig: College-students' moral quality is composed of moral cognition, moral emotion and moral will.
sent.trans: 大学生道德素质由道德认识、道德感情和道德意志构成。

sent.orig: Moral cognition, moral emotions and moral behavior are universally recognized three essential elements of morality.
sent.trans: 道德认知、道德情感和道德行为是人们普遍确认的组成品德的基本要素。

sent.orig: As one form of moral education, moral penetration is attracting increasing attention compared to moral inculcation.
sent.trans: 而作为德育教育方式之一的德育渗透，相对于德育灌输也越来越受到人们的关注。

sent.orig: Formulate the moral issues, moral questions, and moral norms in terms of justice.
sent.trans: 以公正为前提，提出道德争议、道德问题和道德规范。
